name: cto
description: CTO/Tech leadership organization - top level of the hierarchy

name: tr_product_pillar_team
description: Product pillar team - second level in hierarchy under cto

name: tr_subpillar_name
description: Sub-pillar name - third level in hierarchy under tr_product_pillar_team

name: tr_product_id
description: Product ID - fourth level in hierarchy under tr_subpillar_name

name: apm_id
description: Application Portfolio Management ID - fifth level in hierarchy between tr_product_id and application

name: application
description: Application name - sixth level in hierarchy under apm_id
